flawed_nl_solution:
For each class, he has to review the questions of 35 students, in total, he will review 10 * 35 = <<10*35=350>>350 questions.
For the 5 classes, he will review a total of 350 * 5 = <<350*5=1705>>1705 questions.
#### 1705

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1750, not 1705. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
